org.contentmine.graphics.svg.image

Class ImageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.image.ImageConverter

  • public class ImageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    utility methods to help processing images.

    Examples are very large images in href/data attributes and images which might be stitched together

    Author:
    pm286

      • readHrefValue

        public void readHrefValue(java.lang.String data)
        reads a string corresponding to value of xlink:href data. This is normally a base64 encoding of the image data.
        Parameters:
        data -

      • getStrippedHref

        public java.lang.String getStrippedHref()
        checks string including imageType and returns substring after image.
        Returns:

      • extractImageStringBoundaries

        public java.util.List<IntRange> extractImageStringBoundaries()
        extracts all image data strings.

        Very crude. Designed to parse very long strings on assumption they come from XOM tools. detects . If it works may be refined. Range limits point to "!<" and "/>!". Note- will fail on prefixed XML.

        Returns:
        empty list if none

      • createImageFiles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> createImageFiles()
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        creates a list of filenames and fills them with contents of Hrefs.

        filenames are of form target/images/foo.2.png

        Parameters:
        imageDir - directory for files
        fileRoot - root of files (e.g. "foo")
        mimeType - e.g.image/png
        Returns:
        list of filenames (with relative syntax (/rather than \\)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        creates directory if not existing
